channel.title: Need help with with environment variables. (Windows 7)
channel.description:
Hello,
So I want to start a server again, but my java seems to have problems. I always have that "The system cannot find the path specified" error, although I have set my environment variables and I have edited the "run" and "compile" files to the current JDK and JRE versions.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dje837.jpg[/img]
Can someone give me the right codes, that I need to add there, and tell which box they should be and how to add them the right way? :D

item.title: Need help with with environment variables. (Windows 7)
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/environment/paths.html

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with with environment variables. (Windows 7)
